filename: Methane Biocatalysis - Selecting the Right Microbe.pdf
objective_summary: The main research objective of this paper is to explore the process of methane biocatalysis and identify the most suitable microorganisms for this purpose. The approach involves a comprehensive review of existing literature and methodologies to understand the various microbial candidates and their potential applications in methane biocatalysis.
title: Methane Biocatalysis - Selecting the Right Microbe
